column5: I posted a topic earlier and many of you have liked the Reed Lake area. Any futher inputs on campgrounds, or other lakes in the area would be great. Looking for big Northern, Walleye, and Trout. Thanks again, Brian

Big Pike,Lakers,Walleye let me tell you Reed is all you need.Its well known for the big Northerns.Probably the best drive to lake in Manitoba for those guys.Go around the end of may or early june you won't be sorry.I'm sure glad its only 2.5 hours from my house can hardly wait for my spring trip there.FISH ON.
Any more info on Reed? Where about is it? East of Flin Flon, not that far? Etc. Thanks Bill
Reed lake is about an hour north east of Flin Flon.Great campsites beautiful scenery.Email me if you want more info.FISH ON.
